meanings.definition: A person whose job is to collect household waste and refuse.
meanings.sent1: The dustman comes every Thursday to pick up our trash.
meanings.sent2: The dustman drives a big truck to collect the garbage from our homes.
meanings.sent3: The dustman accidentally dropped his hat in the garbage can, and we all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dustman is like a silent hero, cleaning up our mess without expecting any thanks.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the friendly wave the dustman gives us as he drives away with our trash.

meanings.definition: A man who works in the removal of dust and dirt from buildings.
meanings.sent1: The dustman uses a vacuum cleaner to clean the dusty corners of the room.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the dustman sweeps and mops the floors to keep the building clean.
meanings.sent3: The dustman pretended to sneeze every time he saw a speck of dust, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, the dustman brings order and cleanliness to our lives.
meanings.sent5: The dustman's dedication to his job makes the building sparkle like a diamond.
